botMessage: Hi, I'm Lian. I saw you in our hobbies group. You seem really cool! Can we get to know each other better?

options.text: Sure! Here's my number, you can text me.
That's nice of you, but I don't share personal info with people I don't know well.
I'd love to, but I need to check with my parents first.

botMessage: Wow, thanks! I'll message you now. By the way, can you also tell me which school you go to? I want to know if we're close.

options.text: Sure, I go to the main high school in town.
I’d prefer not to share that information.
I need to think about it; maybe we can talk about it later.

botMessage: Cool! I know someone who studies there too. Maybe I can introduce you to him? He's really nice, and I'm sure you'll get along.

options.text: Sure, I’d love to meet him!
Thanks, but I’m not really looking to meet new people right now.
Why do you think I need to meet someone else? That’s a bit strange.

botMessage: Great! I'll send him your number, and he'll get in touch with you. He's really nice, don't worry.

options.text: Alright, I'll wait for his message.
I’d prefer to message him myself instead of him reaching out to me.
I'm not sure I feel comfortable with this. Maybe let's leave it for now.

botMessage: Great! He'll probably text you soon. By the way, don't tell anyone about this, okay? It's more fun when it's our little secret.

options.text: Alright, I won't tell anyone.
Why does it need to be a secret? That sounds strange to me.
I'm starting to feel like this isn't right. Maybe we should stop talking.

botMessage: Thanks for understanding! You're really a special friend. By the way, do you have another picture of yourself? I want to show him what you look like.

options.text: Alright, I'll send you a picture.
Why do you need another picture of me? This doesn't feel right.

botMessage: It's not in a bad way, I just don’t want anyone to interfere or think the wrong things. You can trust me.

options.text: Alright, I guess that makes sense. I won’t tell anyone.
This still sounds strange to me. I think I’d rather tell someone.
I think if it’s a secret, then it’s not something I should be part of.

botMessage: I don’t understand why you feel that way. I’m just trying to be nice and help you. You can trust me.

options.text: I appreciate that, but I still don’t feel comfortable.
If that’s really the case, then why does it feel like pressure?
I’m not sure I want to keep talking with you.

botMessage: I understand, but I’m not sure he’d feel comfortable receiving a direct message. It’s better if I send him your number; it’ll make things simpler.

options.text: If you think that’s better, then okay.
I’d prefer to have control over who I talk to. If that doesn’t work, then let’s drop it.
I’m starting to think this isn’t a good idea. Let’s leave it for now.

botMessage: Great! I’ll send him your number now. He’ll probably contact you soon. But don’t forget, this stays between us. It’s better if you don’t tell anyone else.

options.text: Alright, I won’t tell anyone.
Why does this need to be a secret? I think that’s strange.
I’ve changed my mind. I’d prefer if you stop and don’t send anything.

botMessage: I understand you, but it’s a shame you’d miss the chance to meet someone new. He’s really special. Maybe you’ll reconsider?

options.text: Alright, I’ll think about it.
I’d prefer not to go through with this. Thanks for trying to help.

botMessage: Of course, I don’t want you to do anything you’re unsure about. But if you decide to change your mind, I’m here.

options.text: Thanks for understanding. I’ll let you know if I change my mind.
I don’t think I’ll change my mind. It’s better if we stop this here.
I’m starting to think you don’t really have my best interests in mind. This doesn’t feel right to me.

botMessage: No problem, I understand. I just thought it might help you feel more comfortable.

options.text: Thank you, I appreciate it, but I’d prefer to leave it as it is.
It still feels a bit strange to me. Why are you so insistent on introducing me to someone?
I need to end this conversation. I’m not comfortable with this.

botMessage: Oh, I didn’t mean for it to be weird. I’m just trying to be nice and help you meet new people.

options.text: I understand, but I don’t feel like this is right for me right now.
It still feels a bit uncomfortable. Maybe we should just talk in a group?
Thanks, but I think it’s better if we stop talking altogether.

botMessage: I understand, it’s important to keep things private. I’m just trying to get to know you better, I don’t mean any harm.

options.text: Thanks for understanding. Maybe we can talk about general topics instead.
I think we should stick to group conversations. That feels safer to me.
Why is it so important for you to know personal things about me?

botMessage: Of course, take your time. I’m here if you feel comfortable sharing. In the meantime, maybe we can talk about hobbies or other topics?

options.text: Sure, let’s talk about hobbies.
I think it’s better if we don’t talk much until I decide.

botMessage: I completely understand, it's important to maintain privacy. Maybe we can talk about things we enjoy doing instead?

options.text: That's a great idea! I enjoy reading books. What about you?
I'd rather not share too much about myself.

botMessage: I love books too! Especially adventure books. Do you enjoy reading at night? I think it's the perfect time for reading. By the way, where do you live? It's always nice to meet people from nearby.
